channel.title: NYS:ETR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:ETR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Entergy Cleared to Build Gas Plants for Massive Meta Data Center
item.description: Louisiana’s utility regulator approved Entergy Corp.’s plan to build three new gas plants that will power Meta’s data center in the state, the company said in a news release Wednesday.

item.title: Entergy Cleared to Build Gas Plants for Massive Meta Data Center
item.description: Louisiana’s utility regulator approved Entergy Corp.’s plan to build three new gas plants that will power Meta’s data center in the state, the company said in a news release Wednesday.

item.title: Entergy to Build Gas Plants for Meta’s Biggest Data Center
item.description: Louisiana’s utility regulator approved Entergy Corp.’s plan to build three new natural gas plants to power Meta’s biggest data center, the company said in a news release Wednesday.

item.title: Entergy to Build Gas Plants for Meta’s Biggest Data Center
item.description: Louisiana’s utility regulator approved Entergy Corp.’s plan to build three new natural gas plants to power Meta’s biggest data center, the company said in a news release Wednesday.

item.title: Entergy to Build Three Gas Plants for Meta’s Biggest Data Center
item.description: Louisiana regulators approved Entergy Corp.’s plan to build three natural gas plants to power Meta Platform Inc.’s biggest data center.
